sentences.en: A permanent cure will only be effected by acupuncture, chiropractic or manipulation.
sentences.cn: 只有针灸、脊椎指压治疗或者推拿术才能实现彻底治愈。

sentences.en: an operation that can cure short-sightedness in 15 minutes
sentences.cn: 15分钟就可治愈近视的一种手术

sentences.en: He needed surgery to cure a troublesome back injury.
sentences.cn: 他需要做手术来治好烦人的背伤。

sentences.en: He says he can cure me but I still doubt him.
sentences.cn: 他说他能治好我的病,但我还是不相信他.

sentences.en: He went to a clinic to cure his drinking and overeating.
sentences.cn: 他去诊所戒酒并控制饮食。

sentences.en: Many people believe that prison isn't a cure for crime.
sentences.cn: 许多人认为监禁并不是治愈犯罪的良方.

sentences.en: Many types of cancer can now be cured.
sentences.cn: 现在许多癌症都可以治好。

sentences.en: Massage isn't a long-term cure for stress.
sentences.cn: 按摩对缓解压力并非长期有效。

sentences.en: Oranges, lemons and limes were found to cure scurvy.
sentences.cn: 人们发现橙子、柠檬和酸橙能治疗坏血病。

sentences.en: Prevention is better than cure, so start looking after your heart now.
sentences.cn: 防病比治病好, 所以从现在开始照顾好你的心脏.

sentences.en: Radical eye surgery promises to cure short-sightedness.
sentences.cn: 彻底的眼部手术有望治愈近视。

sentences.en: She had some acupuncture treatment which seems to have cured her.
sentences.cn: 她接受了某种针刺疗法，好像把她的病治好了。

sentences.en: The new treatment effected a miraculous cure.
sentences.cn: 这种新疗法产生了奇迹般的疗效。

sentences.en: The salesman proclaimed that his tonic would cure all diseases.
sentences.cn: 推销员宣称他的滋补品将治愈所有的病.

sentences.en: Their discovery could herald a cure for some forms of impotence.
sentences.cn: 他们的发现可能预示着为某些类型的阳痿找到了医治方法。

sentences.en: This is a possible cure to fight off cancer.
sentences.cn: 这也许是治愈癌症的良方.

sentences.en: Will you be able to cure him, Doctor?
